Facilité la recherche des stages et des: Facilitates the search for internships and IEPs for students
Le stage est considéré: The internship is considered by legal and economic sciences as a professional immersion which aims to apply the theoretical knowledge acquired through your training. The internship provides operational responses to concrete or strategic projects
De nombreuses entreprises: Many companies see this internship as an opportunity for an observation period before hiring. The internship and supervision manager provides personalized follow-up for each student and selects institutions according to rigorous criteria. He helps each student define their professional project
BLP intègre des professionnels dans le c: BLP integrates professionals into the teaching staff, each in their own field, they intervene in the form of conferences, tutorials or thematic modules
Les entreprises et les professionnels: Companies and professionals are also involved in the development of programs and the monitoring of internships for our students. Thanks to these frequent exchanges, students are, from the 1st year, in direct contact with the professional world.
BLP a adopté un modèle d’enseignement or: BLP has adopted an employee-oriented teaching model
